channel.title: Astral rune problem again
channel.description:
Since no1 applied to my last one hope use do this time lol. Im using Project Insanity ( Hybrid Pvp )
Im having problems with the astral runes basically if you havnt got the astral runes the cast wont spell ( obviously ) when i do have them in my inventory though say if i had 900 ? even 5 ( u need 4 to veng ) it will say 0/4 but it will let u cast the spell because i have the runes . IF YOU COULD PLEASE HELP ME IVE SPENT COUPLE HOURS AND I CANT FIX IT
HERES SOME PICTURES TO HELP SHOW YOU : http://www.iimmgg.com/image/bb518adb4538df327bd5e33b824f8541 - With runes working but says 0/4 http://www.iimmgg.com/image/7915fc58d2a028d49dd8a775021c88d2 - Without runes normal
